# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the peer picker controller.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any GKPeerPickerControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKPeerPickerControllerDelegate] formal protocol.
